metadata.title: CVE-2021-47116 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ext4: fix memory leak in ext4_mb_init_backend on error path.Fix a memory leak discovered by syzbot when a file system is corruptedwith an illegally large s_log_groups_per_flex.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
